abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders of Vermont, independent who is seeking Democratic nomination for president, appeals to some young Americans with his progressive viewpoints, but also strikes a chord with older voters; 73-year-old, who is far behind Democratic rival Hillary Clinton in polls, is among most liberal members of probable Democratic field.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sanders, 73, whose progressive views often appeal to young Americans, also seems to be striking a deep chord with older voters as his campaign gets underway.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders’s Message Resonates With a Certain Age Group: His Own
headline.print_headline: Sanders Lures a Certain Age of Voters: His

snippet: Mr. Sanders, 73, whose progressive views often appeal to young Americans, also seems to be striking a deep chord with older voters as his campaign gets underway.
